product_entries.full_product_description: SUPPLY & INSTALLATION OF PLC BASED DV CONTROL PANEL FOR FOAM SPRINKLER SYSTEM AND FIRE WATER PUMPING SYSTEM INTERGRATION PANEL WITH PLC. Supply,Installation,Termination of cable,Testing and Commissioning of PLC Based Deluge Valve Control Panel with accessories. The panel should have local push botton switched for emergency operation from panel.Panel and associated accessories shall be designed to withstand environmental conditions at site.Panel in open areas shall be weatherproof to IP-65 as per IS/ IEC-60529. Canopy/Shed of adequate sizes shall be provided for each panel to protect from weather, the cost of the same shall be included in the panel cost.No extra payment shall be made for providing fixture , fittings & accessories. PLC Based DELUGE VALVE CONTROL PANEL should contain the following:- 1. Programmable Logic Controller. 2.Solid State type or microprocessor based programmable type Alarm Annunciator  with sounder. 3.UPS. 4.Cables (Power & Control) Specification of Programmable Logic Controller (PLC) : 1.Input Power: 24vdc,Redundant Supply. 2.Application capabilities with up to 7 expansion I/O modules for a maximum of 256 discrete I/O. 3.Up to 6 embedded 100 kHz highspeed counters (on controllers with dc inputs) 4.2 Serial ports with DF1/ DH485/Modbus RTU/DNP3/ASCII protocol support. 5.Ethernet port provides you with  EtherNet/IP, DNP3 over IP and Modbus TCP/IP protocol support as well as web server and email capabilities. 6.Built-in LCD with backlight allows you to view controller and I/O status, and provides a simple interface for messages, bit / integer monitoring and manipulation. 9.Memory:non-volatile battery backed RAM. 10.online editing:yes. 11.Operating Temp.:-20°C...+60°C. 12.Storage Temp:-40°C (or -30°C)...+85°C. Specification of Solid State type or microprocessor based programmable type Alarm Annunciator with sounder:  Window display shall be back lighted incandescent lamps or cluster LED type integral power supply. Specification of UPS: 1.Alarm Condition: 1 hours. 2.Standalone Condition: 4 Hours. For 22 nos. Deluge Valve IO point 3 nos (22 W + 3 S)-SOLVENT PLANT

product_entries.full_product_description: SUPPLY & ERECTION OF HMI PC Supply,Installation and Commissioning of HMI PC with all accessories complete in all respect and UPS of suitable capacity capable supply power for atleast 1 hour in Alarm Condition & 4 hours in Standalone Condition. (Two Sets of HMI PC shall be provided in two different Locations, one at Control Room/Security Cabin and another at Admin Block) Specification of HMI PC: 1.Site specific HMI software and provision for stimulation DV System. 2.HMI Software for one user with paper licence. 3.Harddisk:1TB. 4.RAM: 8 GB. 5.Display:21" LED. 6.OS: windows lateset professional version. 7.DVD drive  ± R/RW 16X. 8.Processor 32 bit Intel Xeon Quad Core Processor with  2.8 GHz. 9.Graphics NVIDIA Quadro 600 with 1GB video memory. 10.event history:min 1 month.
product_entries.feature_or_specifications: ups: suitable capacity for 1 hour alarm, 4 hours standalone, hmi software: site specific, provision for stimulation dv system, licence: paper, os: windows latest professional version, dvd drive: ± R/RW 16X, processor: 32 bit intel xeon quad core 2.8 GHz, graphics: nvidia quadro 600 with 1GB video memory, event history: min 1 month, location: control room/security cabin and admin block

original_rows.1: PLC AUTOMATION
SUPPLY & INSTALLATION OF PLC BASED DV CONTROL PANEL FOR FOAM SPRINKLER SYSTEM AND FIRE WATER PUMPING SYSTEM INTERGRATION PANEL WITH PLC.

Supply,Installation,Termination of cable,Testing and Commissioning of PLC Based Deluge Valve Control Panel with accessories. The panel should have local push botton switched for emergency operation from panel.Panel and associated accessories shall be designed to withstand environmental conditions at site.Panel in open areas shall be weatherproof to IP-65 as per IS/ IEC-60529. Canopy/Shed of adequate sizes shall be provided for each panel to protect from weather, the cost of the same shall be included in the panel cost.No extra payment shall be made for providing fixture , fittings & accessories.

PLC Based DELUGE VALVE CONTROL PANEL should contain the following:- 1. Programmable Logic Controller. 2.Solid State type or microprocessor based programmable type Alarm Annunciator  with sounder. 3.UPS. 4.Cables (Power & Control)

Specification of Programmable Logic Controller (PLC) : 1.Input Power: 24vdc,Redundant Supply. 2.Application capabilities with up to 7 expansion I/O modules for a maximum of 256 discrete I/O. 3.Up to 6 embedded 100 kHz highspeed counters (on controllers with dc inputs) 4.2 Serial ports with DF1/ DH485/Modbus RTU/DNP3/ASCII protocol support. 5.Ethernet port provides you with  EtherNet/IP, DNP3 over IP and Modbus TCP/IP protocol support as well as web server and email capabilities. 6.Built-in LCD with backlight allows you to view controller and I/O status, and provides a simple interface for messages, bit / integer monitoring and manipulation. 9.Memory:non-volatile battery backed RAM. 10.online editing:yes. 11.Operating Temp.:-20°C...+60°C. 12.Storage Temp:-40°C (or -30°C)...+85°C.

Specification of Solid State type or microprocessor based programmable type Alarm Annunciator with sounder:  Window display shall be back lighted incandescent lamps or cluster LED type integral power supply.
Specification of UPS: 1.Alarm Condition: 1 hours. 2.Standalone Condition: 4 Hours.
For 22 nos. Deluge Valve IO point 3 nos (22 W + 3 S)-SOLVENT PLANT
For 3 nos. Deluge Valve  IO point 1 nos (3 W + 1 S)-RESIN PLANT
For 2 nos. Deluge Valve  IO point 1 nos (2 W + 1 S) -,MONOMER & STYRENE
For 4 nos. Deluge Valve  IO point 1 nos(4 W + 1 S) -WATER BASED PLANT
For 2 nos. Deluge Valve  IO point 1 nos (2 W + 1 S)-SUBSTATION BUILDING
For 1 nos. Deluge Valve  IO point 1 nos (1 W + 1 S) -,SOFA AREA
For 1 nos. Deluge Valve  IO point 1 nos (1 W + 1 S)-PTC
For 1 nos. Deluge Valve  IO point 1 nos (1 W + 1 S) -,FG-1
For 1 nos. Deluge Valve  IO point 1 nos(1 W + 1 S) -,MONOMER COLD ROOM
For 2 nos. Deluge Valve  IO point 1 nos (2 W + 1 S) - DEG & MEG TANK FIRM
For 8 nos. Deluge Valve  IO point 1 nos (8 W + 1 S) - resin TANK FIRM foam generator & MVWS.
For 4 nos. Deluge Valve  IO point 1 nos(4 W + 1 S) - SOFA TANK area foam generator.
For 2 nos. Deluge Valve  IO point 1 nos(2 W + 1 S) - styrene & monomer tank area foam generator.
For 2 nos. Deluge Valve IO point 1 nos (2 W + 1 S) - raw material curtain.
For 2 Nos. Electric Motor driven Pump,2 Nos. of Diesel Engine driven Pump,2 nos. of Jockey Pumps, Air Compressor running-"ON" & "OFF" Condition.
SUPPLY & ERECTION OF HMI PC

Supply,Installation and Commissioning of HMI PC with all accessories complete in all respect and UPS of suitable capacity capable supply power for atleast 1 hour in Alarm Condition & 4 hours in Standalone Condition. (Two Sets of HMI PC shall be provided in two different Locations, one at Control Room/Security Cabin and another at Admin Block)

Specification of HMI PC: 1.Site specific HMI software and provision for stimulation DV System. 2.HMI Software for one user with paper licence. 3.Harddisk:1TB. 4.RAM: 8 GB. 5.Display:21" LED. 6.OS: windows lateset professional version. 7.DVD drive  ± R/RW 16X. 8.Processor 32 bit Intel Xeon Quad Core Processor with  2.8 GHz. 9.Graphics NVIDIA Quadro 600 with 1GB video memory. 10.event history:min 1 month.
Optical Fiber  Cable  (OFC)
Specification of OFC Cable : Cable Description  : 6F LT-SM/MM Single sheath armoured O.F. cable with HDPE encasing pipe.
